import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' const UserProfile = () => { const [Info, setInfo] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const getI = async () => { const stats = await getInfo() setInfo(stats) } getI() }, []) const getInfo = async () => { const res = await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/userinfo/${sessionStorage.getItem("tokenId")}`) const data = await res.json() console.log(data) return data } return (
